alert.note: Alert for Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS GreenBay (East Central Wisconsin - Green Bay)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 13 at 4:40PM CDT by NWS GreenBay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Forest, Florence, northern Marinette, northern Oconto and eastern Langlade Counties through 530 PM CDT... At 438 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles east of North Otter Creek Natural Area, or 12 miles east of Crandon, moving north at 25 mph. Spotters reported hail up to dime size in the strongest storms. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and dime size hail. SOURCE...Spotter reported. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Popple River, Fern, Tipler and Whisker Lake Wilderness. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Florence; Forest; Langlade; Northern Marinette County; Northern Oconto County
